Uses of Interface
org.drombler.commons.context.Context

    • Uses of Context in org.drombler.commons.context

      Classes in org.drombler.commons.context that implement Context 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractContext
      A base class for Context implementations.
      class  ContextWrapper
      A Context wrapper wraps another Context.
      class  ProxyContext
      A Context which proxies other contexts.
      class  SimpleContext
      A simple context with a writable content.

      Methods in org.drombler.commons.context with parameters of type Context 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ProxyContext.addContext(Context context)
      Adds another Context to be proxied by this context.

      Registers a local context for the given Object.
